unit:
# pseudo-syntax for letters: # # {display text}:{vo label}:{hexadecimal color code}:correct # # if vo label is missing, it defaults to "same as display text"; # if color code is missing, it defaults to black (0x000000); # exactly one of each letters pair must carry the "correct" indication # p; bat_baseball l; b:::correct; g l; a:::correct; n l; f; t:::correct
p; rat l; s; r:::correct l; n; a:::correct l; t:::correct; m
p; hat l; h:::correct; b l; o; a:::correct l; t:::correct; p
p; pat l; g; p:::correct l; a:::correct; x l; t:::correct; d
p; mat l; w; m:::correct l; i; a:::correct l; k; t:::correct
p; cat l; c:::correct; d l; m; a:::correct l; t:::correct; h
p; bat_rodent l; p; b:::correct l; a:::correct; r l; t:::correct; d
# VO's used in each exercise (one set for each cycle) # cycle 1 v; b; a; t; bat v; r; a; t; rat v; h; a; t; hat v; p; a; t; pat v; m; a; t; mat v; c; a; t; cat v; b; a; t; bat
# directions d; D014 d; D017 d; D002 d; D013
